title: Which results from injury to medulla

content.question: Which of the following would most likely result from an injury to the medulla?

choices.label: Receptive aphasia that makes it difficult to understand what other people are saying
Retrograde amnesia that destroys previously established memories
A life-threatening disruption of heartbeat and breathing

content.answer: A life-threatening disruption of heartbeat and breathing

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
